channel.title: Comments on: Almond and Vanilla Porridge

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi everyone - love the sound of your flavour suggestions, I am still eating the almond and vanilla one, but have tried a brown sugar and cinnamon one but it didn't taste as good.
Hi Mary - Thanks for visiting, I hope you continue to like the posts :P
item.content:encoded:
Hi everyone – love the sound of your flavour suggestions, I am still eating the almond and vanilla one, but have tried a brown sugar and cinnamon one but it didn’t taste as good.

Hi Mary – Thanks for visiting, I hope you continue to like the posts ðŸ˜›

item.title: By: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @ Not Quite Nigella
item.description: I agree, homemade oatmeal from scratch can't be beat. I used to eat the Quaker packets but I like making it myself and haven't used a packet for ages. Nice flavour combination!
item.content:encoded: I agree, homemade oatmeal from scratch can’t be beat. I used to eat the Quaker packets but I like making it myself and haven’t used a packet for ages. Nice flavour combination!

item.title: By: Mary
item.dc:creator: Mary
item.description: Pretty cool post. I just stumbled upon your site and wanted to say that I have really liked reading your blog posts. Any way I'll be subscribing to your feed and I hope you post again soon!
item.content:encoded:
Pretty cool post. I just stumbled upon your site and wanted to say
that I have really liked reading your blog posts. Any way
I’ll be subscribing to your feed and I hope you post again soon!

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: I love this idea of making your own!
item.content:encoded: I love this idea of making your own!

item.title: By: FFichiban
item.dc:creator: FFichiban
item.description: Oohh I like the sound of combining all the suggestions to create an almon/vanilla/brown sugar/cinnamon/banana and apple porridge with a squeeze of honey
item.content:encoded: Oohh I like the sound of combining all the suggestions to create an almon/vanilla/brown sugar/cinnamon/banana and apple porridge with a squeeze of honey

item.title: By: parita
item.dc:creator: parita
item.description: Healthy and flavorful, i love vanilla and cinnamon together..yum yum!
item.content:encoded: Healthy and flavorful, i love vanilla and cinnamon together..yum yum!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Very true about homemade being healthier and cheaper! Crushed almonds sounds like a nice way to eat porridge. You could try banana or apple cooked in the mix too if you don't like dried fruit.
item.content:encoded: Very true about homemade being healthier and cheaper! Crushed almonds sounds like a nice way to eat porridge. You could try banana or apple cooked in the mix too if you don’t like dried fruit.

item.title: By: Beta Gal
item.dc:creator: Beta Gal
item.description: I've been having quick microwave porridge almost every morning for the past month or so, even though I normally don't eat breakfast and don't like porridge. I like the brown sugar and cinnamon flavour of Uncle Toby's. Plus it's so easy to make.
item.content:encoded: I’ve been having quick microwave porridge almost every morning for the past month or so, even though I normally don’t eat breakfast and don’t like porridge. I like the brown sugar and cinnamon flavour of Uncle Toby’s. Plus it’s so easy to make.
